name: Professional Gambler
overview: A gambling duo that contains "Banco - The Game of Baccarat" & "Draw Poker". 1. Baccarat Only the click of chips is missing from this computer version of the popular card game-Baccarat. Beautiful graphic images heighten the excitement of this challenging game. Unsure of the rules? The rules are built right in! You'll need quick wits to outguess the computer and build a winning hand. Getting nine points may be the hardest thing you have ever done! 2. Draw Poker It's Saturday night and the stakes are high. Through the smokey haze, light glimmers off the screen. Sitting across from you is the toughest dealer in town - your computer. It's been said that poker is a game of skill. Here's your chance to prove it! You'll start with $5,000. Try to break the bank and walk away a winner. And remember - no aces up your sleeve in this game!
